snippet.title: Blind Fate: Edo no Yami - PAX Online Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Add to your Steam wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1294880/Blind_Fate_Edo_no_Yami/

You are Yami, a cyber samurai. Blindly loyal to the Shogun, you exterminate your master’s wicked enemies without hesitation. 

A single mistake has cost you your sight so you must now learn to “perceive” the world in a new way. Embark on a journey of discovery in a strange land inhabited by mythological beings from Japanese folklore and killer robots.

Let the true hunt begin!

http://www.edonoyami.com
https://twitter.com/_Troglobytes_
https://facebook.com/Troglobytes
https://discord.gg/Troglobytes
